detailsData.title: Free Consultation
detailsData.content: We look forward to discussing your case with you. Call us today to schedule your free, no-obligation consultation.

detailsData.title: No Fee Until You Win
detailsData.content: We take injury cases on a contingency basis, meaning we do not get paid unless you do.

detailsData.title: 25+ Years Experience
detailsData.content: Put our experience with insurance companies and in the Philadelphia and New Jersey courts to work for you and get the maximum value of your injury case.

detailsData.title: Client-Centric Approach
detailsData.content: At Cousin Benny, we treat our clients like family, ensuring your case gets the attention and dedication it deserves.

address: 1617 John F. Kennedy Blvd., #355D Philadelphia, PA 19103
valueProp: Our injury attorneys in Philadelphia are dedicated to helping you get the justice you deserve. You can count on us to treat you like our family and handle your case according to our core values of trust, hard work, and integrity. We don’t back down from big insurance companies and NEVER accept less than maximum value for your case. Don’t get lost in the shuffle. At Cousin Benny, we’ll give your case the attention it deserves.
CTA: Find out **how much** your case is worth

testimonalData.text: Thank you Ben Hoffman for an excellent job. I will keep you in mind should I ever need your services again.
testimonalData.author: S.G.

testimonalData.text: Ben Hoffman provided me with excellent service. He was always there when I needed to speak with him.
testimonalData.author: R.N.

testimonalData.text: Very smart lawyer. Honest and responsive as well! He represented me a while back and was able to get me a great settlement.
testimonalData.author: D.H.
